short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the twitch default preloader with the dankCircle emote.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the default twitch.tv sitewide preloader with the dankCircle BetterTTV emote. Fully compatible with any third party extensions, as all this does is inject a few lines of CSS to any Twitch tab on load.
